name: Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis
description: '''James Samuel''' "'''Jimmy Jam'''" '''Harris III''' (born June 6, 1959) and '''Terry Steven Lewis''' (born November 24, 1956) are an American [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]]/[[Pop music|pop]] songwriting and record production team. Their productions have received commercial success since the 1980s with various artists, most extensively [[Janet Jackson]]. They have written 31 top ten hits in the UK and 41 in the US. In 2022, the duo were inducted into the [[Rock and Roll Hall of Fame]] in the Musical Excellence category.
